pokemonmaster:EventID.NAME: Event Name
DESCRIPTIONS: This is event text, generally used to describe what's happening.
You have to mark every word individually.
You can also use [#ffffff]white[] hex color codes like this to color text.
This also works in card text! But not on keywords.
OPTIONS: Select card to remove. (You can also stick extra text like this in here.)

pokemonmaster:EeveeEvolve.NAME: Eeveelution
DESCRIPTIONS: In your journey through the Spire you come across a cavernous room filled with small stones in a variety of colours. You can feel your Eevee's excitement.
What's this? Your Eevee is evolving!
OPTIONS: [Dark Blue]This one feels solid and soothing to the touch.
[Yellow] This one feels hot and painful.
[Red] It's warm and ashy, with parts turning to dust.
[Purple] While holding this you get a strong sense of Deja-Vu.
[Light Blue] It's a nice firm stone, very cold to the touch.
[Green] This stone fills you with a sense of... Determination...
